channel.title: Typescript on benchr
channel.description: Recent content in Typescript on benchr

item.title: Typescript
item.description: In this blog post I am going to write about a programming language which I have not checked out before. Typescript is a super set of Javascript and is developed by Microsoft. The syntax is exactly the same as Javascript with one very important difference: in comparison to Javascript Typescript knows the concept of types and checks them with a built in type system. To make type failure messages more useful Typescript is also a compiled language while Javascript is an interpreted language.
